title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set.
OB: An error is shown when a table report item is added without setting the dataset and the user tries to create a new table group. The error message indicates that the dataset is required for defining a group.
EB: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set. When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, the user should still be able to go and define a group in the table.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try creating a new table group.
3. User should be able to define a group without any issues, even if the dataset is not defined.
